Package org.middleheaven.quantity.time.clocks

Interface Summary
ClockTickListener  
Schedule  
Ticker Represents a relative time elapsing device similiar in mechanics as System.nanoTime().
 

Class Summary
Clock A clock.
ClockTicked  
IntervalSchedule  
MachineClock The clock used by the machine.
SpeedyClock A clock with variable cadence.
StaticClock A clock with fixed, immutable, time.
StopWatch An utility to compute relative time intervals.
SystemTicker  
TimeContextClock  
TimeZoneClock  
UniversalTimeClock  
WrappedClock Encapsulates another Clock implementation in order to change the original clock behaviour or derive the new Clock properties from the encapsulated clock.
